edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives

Class BucketList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.primitives.BucketList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class BucketList<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an array that holds arrays of Bundles or LimitedBundles. Each inner array is called "bucket".

    It provides some functionality as any array (add, size, get) as well as special functionalities regarding bundles (saveToFiles, loadToFiles).

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

      • BucketList

        public BucketList(ExecutionParameters execution,
          BucketMapping bucketMapping)
        A constructor that initializes the list using the given execution parameters and bucketMapping.
        Parameters:
        execution - contains the number of buckets and bucket size.
        bucketMapping - An object that maps a bundle into the right bucket.

      • getBundle

        public T getBundle(int bucketId,
          int itemId)
        Returns the bundle according to the given item and bucket ids.
        Parameters:
        bucketId - The id of the bucket where the item is placed.
        itemId - The id of the requested item.

      • saveToFiles

        public void saveToFiles(java.lang.String prefix)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Prints the buckets to files. Each bucket is printed to a different file.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix of the files names.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
